long_description: Take your lunch to go with the medium REI eCycle lunch container. It's sized to hold fruit, chips, a side salad or small helping of pasta. eCycle plastic is made from 100% recycled food-grade polypropylene that is 25% post-consumer content; polypropylene plastic is 100% BPA free. Leakproof lid keeps your lunch from spilling on the way to work. Medium container holds 10 fl. oz. Bottom is microwave safe; do not microwave the top. Top rack dishwasher safe. The REI eCycle medium lunch container is recyclable where #5 plastic is collected.
short_description: Take your lunch to go with the medium REI eCycle lunch container. It's sized to hold fruit, chips, a side salad or small helping of pasta.
